values: 时间；（钟表上的）时刻；钟点；（世界各地不同的）计时体系；（某事发生或应该发生的）时候；某段日子；（一生中的）一段日子；时期；时候；时机；时代；时光；岁月；年代；生命（期）；时限；期限；次；回；倍；（乐曲的）拍子；节奏；<英>（酒吧）打烊时间；<英>（酒店等的）营业时间；刑期；服役期；学徒期；计时工资率；工作时间；规定时间；分娩时间；妊娠期；产期；生命期；死期；机会；<美>[体]（一场或一局的）比赛时限；（棒球）暂停；（用于报刊名）时报；时代潮流；世道

bilingual.source: I haven't got time for a chat.

bilingual.target: 在我的空闲时间，我读书。
你在休息时间在这里玩。
我没有足够的空闲时间。

list.abstract: 《时代周刊》（Time）又名《时代》，是由时代华纳主管，亨利·卢斯和布里顿·哈登创办的报刊，美国三大时事性周刊之一，有世界“史库”之称。创办于1923年3月3日。 该刊的宗旨是要使“忙人”能够充分了解世界大事。有美国主版、国际版，以及欧洲、亚洲和拉丁美洲版。设有经济、教育、法律、批评等栏目。根据万方数据网2023年6月数据显示，学术发文总量2389篇，总被引频次996次，篇均被引频次0.417。 1979年1月1日，邓小平在该刊中获选为1978年“年度风云人物”。
《TIME》是韩国的男子组合东方神起的第六张日语正规专辑，由avex trax于2013年3月6日发行。 《TIME》在日本公信榜分别夺得日榜、周榜及月榜冠军，被日本唱片协会认定为白金唱片。

yingyinNormal.en: Time. You're afraid of time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 时间，你害怕时间。

yingyinNormal.en: No time to scrub the car.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没时间清理车

yingyinNormal.en: Time is money my friend?
yingyinNormal.zh: “时间就是金钱”？

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry. Time is a he?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你说什么？时间是个人？
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《爱丽丝梦游仙境2：镜中奇遇记》

yingyinNormal.en: Roland, we don't have much time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 罗兰德，我们时间不多。

yingyinNormal.en: You're wasting your time. What? What?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在浪费时间。什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, time for presents, guys.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，拆礼物时间了，朋友们。

yingyinNormal.en: But I told you, I didn't have the time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但我说过我没有时间。

yingyinNormal.en: It is home time at Peppa's playgroup.
yingyinNormal.zh: 幼儿园的放学时间到了。

yingyinNormal.en: It is home time at Peppa's playgroup.
yingyinNormal.zh: 幼儿园的放学时间到了。

yingyinNormal.en: It is bed time for Peppa and George.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和乔治的睡觉时间到了。

yingyinNormal.en: It is bed time for Peppa and George.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和乔治的睡觉时间到了。

yingyinNormal.en: It is bed time for Peppa and George.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和乔治睡觉的时间到了。

yingyinNormal.en: It is bed time for Peppa and George.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和乔治睡觉的时间到了。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy Pig has been gone for a long time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸已经走了很长时间了。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy Pig has been gone for a long time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸已经走了很长时间了。

yingyinNormal.en: It's hostile, take over time, Sam.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这样浪费时间就太没诚意了，山姆。

yingyinNormal.en: Cup. Time can be funny in dreams.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的杯子。在梦里面时间总是很有趣。

yingyinNormal.en: Just like any simple cell going through time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就像任何细胞随着时间老化。

yingyinNormal.en: You just want more time so you can find us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你就是想拖延时间好找到我们。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 时间; 时刻; 时候
时期; 时代; 年代

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 不合时宜的；不是时候的；发生过早的；不到期的；太年轻的
adj. 及时的；适时的
n. 停工期；[电子] 故障停机时间
adv. 随时
n. 时间表；时间轴；大事年表
n. 加班；加班时间；加班费；加班酬金；延长期；决胜期
n. 定时器；第…次做事的人；计时器；记时器；计时员；记时员
n. 时刻表；时间表；进度；进程；课程表
adj. 从前的；过去的；一度的

word_family.mean: n. 时；时间；时刻；规定时间；可用时间；所用时间；次；回；乘以；…倍；拍子；节拍

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 定时炸弹；不处理就会带来危险的事态

sense_info_list.zh: 时间; 时刻; 时候

examination_example.sentence: Airlines have simply changed the <highlight>time</highlight> a trip is meant to take.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 航空公司只是改变了旅行所需的时间。

examination_example.sentence: Wasted <highlight>time</highlight> is a drag on Americans' economic and private lives, not to mention infuriating.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 浪费的时间耽误了美国人的经济和私人生活，更不用说激怒他们了。

examination_example.sentence: As a linguist once said, "You can get people to think it's nonsense at the same <highlight>time</highlight> that you buy into it."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如一位语言学家曾经说过的那样，“你可以让人们在相信它的同时认为它是胡说八道。”

sense_info_list.en: a particular period in history or in your life
sense_info_list.zh: 时期; 时代; 年代

examination_example.sentence: Restore the glory of former <highlight>times</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 恢复昔日的辉煌。

examination_example.sentence: Hard <highlight>times</highlight> may hold you down at what usually seems like the most inopportune time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艰难的时期可能会让你在看起来最不合适的时候沮丧。

examination_example.sentence: More difficult, in the moment, is discerning precisely how these lean <highlight>times</highlight> are affecting society's character.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 目前，准确地辨别这些萧条时期如何影响社会特性是更困难的。

sense_info_list.en: an occasion when you do something or when something happens

examination_example.sentence: When we look at a face or a picture, our eyes pause on one spot at a <highlight>time</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们看一张脸或一幅画时，我们的眼睛一次停留在一个点上。

examination_example.sentence: How many times have I heard people say,"I could write a book. I just haven't the <highlight>time</highlight>."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我听过多少次人们说:“我可以写一本书。我只是没有时间。”

examination_example.sentence: For the first <highlight>time</highlight> in history more people live in towns than in the country.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 城镇居住人口有史以来第一次超过了农村居住人口。

examination_example.sentence: It's important that we schedule in <highlight>time</highlight> to enjoy the things we love.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 重要的是我们要及时安排时间去享受我们喜欢的事情。

word_usage.usage: time表示“次，回，倍数”时是可数名词；表示“时期，时代，境况，当代”时用复数形式；表示“时间”为不可数名词。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 及时的；适时的
adv. 随时
n. 时间表；时间轴；大事年表
n. 加班；加班时间；加班费；加班酬金；延长期；决胜期
adj. 占用全部工作时间的；全时（上班）的；全日的；全职的
n. 定时器；第…次做事的人；计时器；记时器；计时员；记时员
n. 计时器；钟；表
n. 时刻表；时间表；进度；进程；课程表
n. 时间选择；时机掌握；同步；发生时刻；定时；正时；计时
adj. 一流的；快乐时光的
n. 午餐时间
adj. & adv. 非全日的；兼职的；兼职地
n. 就寝时间；上床时间

word_family.mean: n. 时；时间；时刻；规定时间；可用时间；所用时间；次；回；乘以；…倍；拍子；节拍

examination_example.sentence: He had a great <highlight>time</highlight> sightseeing and relaxing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在观光和放松中度过了一段美好的时光。

examination_example.sentence: Because of his long-<highlight>time</highlight> connection with people in power, Marconi was unable to cut himself off from the fascist regime in Italy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于长期以来与当权者的联系，马可尼无法与意大利的法西斯政权割裂开来。

examination_example.sentence: It takes <highlight>time</highlight> for local governments to reach consensus.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 地方政府需要时间才能达成共识。

examination_example.sentence: It was only uncovered in relatively recent <highlight>times</highlight> that older people's cells divide a smaller number of <highlight>times</highlight> than younger people's.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 直到最近才发现，老年人的细胞分裂次数比年轻人少。

examination_example.sentence: The most toxic part of decision making is going over the same options <highlight>time</highlight> and <highlight>time</highlight> again.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 决策过程中危害最大的部分就是一次又一次地重复同样的选择。

examination_example.sentence: For the first <highlight>time</highlight>, messages were sent electronically across great distances.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 信息第一次以电子方式远距离传送。

sense_info_list.en: a particular point in the day

examination_example.sentence: At the same <highlight>time</highlight>, he also suffered tremendously from a need for acceptance that drove, and sometimes stained, every one of his relationships.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与此同时，他也因为需要接受而遭受巨大的痛苦，这种需要驱动着他的每一段感情，有时甚至玷污了它。

examination_example.sentence: At the same <highlight>time</highlight>, Marconi was uncompromisingly independent intellectually.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与此同时，Marconi在思想上毫不妥协地独立。

examination_example.sentence: By the <highlight>time</highlight> he reached adulthood, he understood that in order to have an impact he had to develop an independent economic base.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他成年时，他明白要想有影响力，他必须建立一个独立的经济基础。

examination_example.sentence: To keep up with the <highlight>times</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 跟上时代。

examination_example.sentence: In a sense, Marconi's vision jumped from his <highlight>time</highlight> to our own.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从某种意义上说，Marconi的视野从他的时代直接升到了我们的时代。

examination_example.sentence: What connected the 19th century and our present <highlight>time</highlight> was the development of wireless communication.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 连接19世纪和我们现在的是无线通信的发展。

examination_example.sentence: The brand told The New York <highlight>Times</highlight> that the plan was to reduce prices to move the stock.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该品牌告诉《纽约时报》，该计划旨在降低价格以转移库存。

examination_example.sentence: B) It was ridiculed by the New York <highlight>Times</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《纽约时报》对此嗤之以鼻。

examination_example.sentence: In January 1920, the New York <highlight>Times</highlight> ridiculed Goddard's theory that rockets could be utilized for space exploration.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1920年1月，《纽约时报》嘲笑Goddard关于火箭可以用于太空探索的理论。

word_usage.usage:
sometime 作副词“某个时候”，用于过去或将来。示例：
Let's have dinner sometime next week.
我们下周找个时间吃顿饭吧。
I saw him sometime last summer.
去年夏天的某个时候我见过他。

some time 作名词词组“一段时间”，也可以作副词词组“某个时候”，示例：
I need some time on my own. 
我需要独处一段时间。
some times 作名词词组“几次，几倍”。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

n. 停工期；[电子] 故障停机时间
adv. 随时
n. 时间表；时间轴；大事年表
n. 加班；加班时间；加班费；加班酬金；延长期；决胜期

adj. 夜间的
n. 时刻表；时间表；进度；进程；课程表
n. 时间选择；时机掌握；同步；发生时刻；定时；正时；计时

word_family.mean: n. 时；时间；时刻；规定时间；可用时间；所用时间；次；回；乘以；…倍；拍子；节拍

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: (用于故事的开头)从前；很久以前
省时间；节省时间；节约时间
时间段；时间周期；时间期限
休闲时间；闲暇时间；休闲时光

examination_example.sentence: The notion that as parents we need to schedule every minute of their <highlight>time</highlight> is not doing them a great service.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为父母，我们需要安排他们每一分钟的时间，这种观念并没有给他们带来很大的帮助。

examination_example.sentence: Even those short of <highlight>time</highlight> or money should be encouraged to cook for themselves and their family.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也要鼓励那些即便是没有时间或缺钱的人为自己和家人做饭。

examination_example.sentence: What is an advantage of spending one's <highlight>time</highlight> alone?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个人独处的优势是什么？

sense_info_list.en: a particular point in the day

examination_example.sentence: It was considered a fashion at that <highlight>time</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这在当时被认为是一种时尚。

examination_example.sentence: One quarter of teachers in an American city said that children in kindergartens had no <highlight>time</highlight> for playing freely.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国一个城市有四分之一的教师表示，幼儿园的孩子没有时间自由玩耍。

examination_example.sentence: And my boyfriend's English is so good that we just basically speak English all the <highlight>time</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而且我男朋友的英语很好，我们基本上就是一直说英语。

examination_example.sentence: 52% of those 65 or older cook at home five or more <highlight>times</highlight> per week; only a third of young people do.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 52%的65岁以上老人每周在家做饭5次或以上；只有三分之一的年轻人这样做。

examination_example.sentence: This will be the third <highlight>time</highlight> you've left a job in the last five years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这将是你在过去五年中第三次离职。

examination_example.sentence: During the second half of the 20th century, grain prices rose dramatically several <highlight>times</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 20世纪下半叶，粮食价格大幅上涨数倍。

examination_example.sentence: The New York <highlight>Times</highlight> revealed how Coca-Cola was funding well-known scientists and organizations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《纽约时报》披露了可口可乐是如何资助知名科学家和组织的。

examination_example.sentence: When it's <highlight>time</highlight> to be social and meet up with your friends, you will be fully there.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到了社交和与朋友见面的时候，你就会完全融入其中。

examination_example.sentence: For example, the United Nations reported that women do nearly three <highlight>times</highlight> as much unpaid domestic work as men.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，联合国报告称，女性无偿做的家务几乎是男性的三倍。

examination_example.sentence: That is 5 <highlight>times</highlight> smaller than the pearl that the fisherman just handed in.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那比渔夫刚交上来的珍珠小5倍。

examination_example.sentence: There are over four <highlight>times</highlight> as many farmers' markets in the US as there were 20 years ago.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国农贸市场的数量是20年前的四倍多。

examination_example.sentence: Students who fail to finish the ninth grade with passing grades in college preparatory coursework are very unlikely to graduate on <highlight>time</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有通过大学预科课程的学生很可能无法按时毕业。

examination_example.sentence: What does the woman say about farmers in her grandfather's <highlight>time</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于她祖父时代的农民，这位女士说了什么？

word_usage.usage:
some time 作名词词组“一段时间”，也可以作副词词组“某个时候”，示例：
I need some time on my own. 
我需要独处一段时间。
some times 作名词词组“几次，几倍”。

sometime 作副词“某个时候”，用于过去或将来。示例：
Let's have dinner sometime next week.
我们下周找个时间吃顿饭吧。
I saw him sometime last summer.
去年夏天的某个时候我见过他。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 及时的；适时的
adv. 随时
adj. 占用全部工作时间的；全时（上班）的；全日的；全职的
n. 定时器；第…次做事的人；计时器；记时器；计时员；记时员
n. 时刻表；时间表；进度；进程；课程表
n. 时间选择；时机掌握；同步；发生时刻；定时；正时；计时
adj. 从前的；过去的；一度的
adj. & adv. 非全日的；兼职的；兼职地
n. 午餐时间
n. 就寝时间；上床时间

word_family.mean: n. 时；时间；时刻；规定时间；可用时间；所用时间；次；回；乘以；…倍；拍子；节拍

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 余暇；空闲时间；业余时间
余暇；空闲时间；业余时间

examination_example.sentence: If I had waited to have the <highlight>time</highlight>, I would still be waiting to write my novel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我等到有时间（才写小说），我会一直在写小说的等待中度过。

examination_example.sentence: That was the period of <highlight>time</highlight> I enjoyed most in Toronto.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那是我在多伦多最开心的一段时间。

examination_example.sentence: The teenage years from 13 to 19 were the most difficult <highlight>time</highlight> for me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从13到19岁的少年时代对我来说是最困难的时期。

examination_example.sentence: When did it rain last <highlight>time</highlight> in Juarez?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 华雷斯上次下雨是什么时候？

examination_example.sentence: It's been ages since we met last <highlight>time</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自从上次见面后，我们已经好久没有见面了。

examination_example.sentence: I ran into Rani's office for the first <highlight>time</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我第一次跑到拉尼的办公室。

sense_info_list.en: a particular point in the day

examination_example.sentence: Following the planned <highlight>time</highlight> will ensure you have enough sleep to get to those early classes and stay wide awake.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 遵循计划好的时间将确保你有足够的睡眠去上早课并保持完全清醒。

examination_example.sentence: Make sure that you plan for these difficulties at the <highlight>time</highlight> of setting your goals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 确保你在设定目标的时候就为这些困难做好了计划。

examination_example.sentence: By the <highlight>time</highlight> I was nine, I was dancing five days a week.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我九岁的时候，我每周有五天都在跳舞。

examination_example.sentence: It's <highlight>time</highlight> to practice reading them every day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是时候每天练习阅读它们了。

examination_example.sentence: When it's <highlight>time</highlight> to repaint, go blue.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当需要重新粉刷时，请刷蓝色。

examination_example.sentence: Albert Einstein added another wrinkle when he theorized that <highlight>time</highlight> varies depending on where you measure it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阿尔伯特·爱因斯坦提出了另一个问题，根据他的理论，时间会因测量地点的不同而改变。

examination_example.sentence: Even advanced physics can't decisively tell us what <highlight>time</highlight> is, because the answer depends on the question you're asking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使是高级物理学也不能明确地告诉我们时间是什么，因为答案取决于你所问的问题。

examination_example.sentence: What if, instead of considering <highlight>time</highlight> in terms of astronomy, we related <highlight>time</highlight> to ecology?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们不从天文学的角度来考虑时间，而是将时间与生态学联系起来呢？

exam_freq_info.chinese: (为...安排)时间; 时刻; (特定)时候; 计时
(以某种方式经历的)事件、时刻

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 时；时间；时刻；规定时间；可用时间；所用时间；次；回；乘以；…倍；拍子；节拍

上次；最后一次；最后时刻
省时间；节省时间；节约时间

sense_info_list.en: an amount of time; the amount of time available to work, rest, etc.

examination_example.sentence: Try to spend more <highlight>time</highlight> on sports every day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 试着每天花更多的时间在运动上。

examination_example.sentence: About 53% of teens now spend at least an hour of free <highlight>time</highlight> on computers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，大约 53% 的青少年至少有一个小时的空闲时间在玩电脑。

examination_example.sentence: We value the <highlight>time</highlight> we spend with our family and friends in our everyday lives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们重视在日常生活中与家人和朋友在一起的时间。

sense_info_list.en: a particular point in the day; the time when something happens or when something should happen
sense_info_list.zh: (为...安排)时间; 时刻; (特定)时候; 计时

examination_example.sentence: I must finish it on <highlight>time</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我必须按时完成计划。

examination_example.sentence: At last it was <highlight>time</highlight> for our Chinese lunch.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 终于到了我们的中式午餐时间了。

examination_example.sentence: Because they can have classes in the cloud classroom at any <highlight>time</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为他们可以随时在云课堂上课。

examination_example.sentence: I am a little nervous every <highlight>time</highlight> I take exams.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每次考试我都有点紧张。

examination_example.sentence: Mum, why do I have to wash hands so many <highlight>times</highlight> a day?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 妈妈，我为什么一天要洗手这么多次？

examination_example.sentence: Second, don't eat too much at a <highlight>time</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其次，不要一次吃太多。

examination_example.sentence: In a word, family members can make us full of energy and powerful all the <highlight>time</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总之，家庭成员可以让我们一直充满活力和力量。

examination_example.sentence: She is asking me to do things for her all the <highlight>time</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她一直要求我为她做事。

examination_example.sentence: Instead, he watches whatever he wants all the <highlight>time</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，他一直在看他想看的东西。

examination_example.sentence: Although he went through a hard <highlight>time</highlight>, the farmer never became discouraged from achieving his goal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然他经历了一段艰难的时期，但这个农民从未对实现他的目标感到气馁。

examination_example.sentence: At that <highlight>time</highlight>, petrol was expensive compared with other fuels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在那个时代，与其他燃料相比，汽油很贵。

examination_example.sentence: I don't want my students to fall behind the <highlight>times</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我不希望我的学生落后于时代。

examination_example.sentence: She called 911 and help arrived just in <highlight>time</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她拨打了911，救援及时赶到。

examination_example.sentence: It's polite of you to apologise in <highlight>time</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你及时道歉是有礼貌的。

examination_example.sentence: They should save their writing in <highlight>time</highlight> on the computer because it may stop working suddenly..
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们应该把他们写的东西及时保存在电脑上，因为它可能会突然停止工作。

sense_info_list.zh: (以某种方式经历的)事件、时刻

examination_example.sentence: We had a fun <highlight>time</highlight> together.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们一起度过了愉快的时光。

examination_example.sentence: It was a happy <highlight>time</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那是一段快乐的时光。

examination_example.sentence: Once upon a <highlight>time</highlight>, there was a boy who was out playing on the beach with his friends.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从前，有一个男孩和他的朋友在沙滩上玩耍。

word_usage.usage:
sometime 作副词“某个时候”，用于过去或将来。示例：
Let's have dinner sometime next week.
我们下周找个时间吃顿饭吧。
I saw him sometime last summer.
去年夏天的某个时候我见过他。

some time 作名词词组“一段时间”，也可以作副词词组“某个时候”，示例：
I need some time on my own. 
我需要独处一段时间。
some times 作名词词组“几次，几倍”。
